comment: I have to say, I myself am the same. I never really got on Twitter much only on my Professional Account for Business purposes. I ended up wanting to check in on  Incredible Brian on there and met some great people. There is actually a very large community on the forums since day one. I remember going on one in particular where all info is pinned to the top for members to access court info etc. Here thousands sit together and discuss. The petition was shared there and that's how I found it the first time. Many avoid twitter due to a few toxic people that have tried to overtake and made some uncomfortable with harassment on others so they go to Forums and Youtube channels mostly for their information over the last few years. Shout out to all the great you tubers who have really been getting the word out and to the petitions too. Many fans, on Twitter, forums, Youtube, Facebook etc spread the word and sign these. The most paramount outside of the Petitions is the YouTubers. I still scroll around and chat on Twitter myself We had a six-hour chat and listening party on a forum and on Facebook for those audios that came out with her admitting to hitting him. Great video as always I just wanted some to know there is so many out there helping spread the word Twitter is just a drop in the pool. I also hate cancel culture but I'm a survivor and I have worked with DV centers and victims doing charities and things. I hate she used them. I still remember the day I saw someone claim Spiritually empowered was a new person looking at the case when she has been doing it for a long time Twitter people just had no idea of all the great YouTubers. It's good to see the recognition from some of them who don't realize JD supporters are everywhere.

author: Jayne Davis

comment: In just 2 weeks of watching, you‚Äôre already a better interviewer than before. You don‚Äôt talk over the top of people anymore, I‚Äôm glad you‚Äôre building on your own marketable skills packet as well as just doing the right thing. Got sick & had to drop the stream: Almost every YouTuber I‚Äôve seen credits Incredibly Average‚Äôs channel as the thing that turned them around on the case. Without the leaked audio & his dedication in providing facts that support them, I don‚Äôt think this would be (almost) an entire platform saying ‚ÄúThe facts don‚Äôt match up & mainstream media is lying to you‚Äù. I saw a story from last year & every single newspaper in the country printed the same front page. It was ‚Äúredacted‚Äù bars (no text but the name & date of the paper). The JOURNALISTS are fed up being forced to fit pieces into the narrative that the owner/board want them to sell. They don‚Äôt believe that they‚Äôre allowed to print the news anymore. What does ‚Äúfreedom of the press‚Äù mean when the people who run the press tell them what to print?

comment:
Thank you for this great video. Would love to see James Franco and Io being called for their deposition. They are accomplices to Amber Heard as well. What disgusts me also is the many celebs like Rose McGowan and Me Too goons who attacked Johnny Depp and called him an abuser. Now that facts are out, they refuse to admit they were wrong. Which doesn't surprise me as they are not the kind of people who admit any wrongdoing. To them, everything they do is perfect and irreproachable.

I have seen comic book writers and TV showrunners who still attack Johnny Depp calling him vile names. Two hack artists, one of them a tv showrunner whom I won't name though many fans know who it is, attacked him on Twitter and when they were confronted by Johnny Depp fans, they blocked them. One still insisting that JD was evil, the other saying that she was a fan of Johnny. Really disgusting hypocrite.

Another thing that disgusts me is the tv shows and celebs like Jessica Chastain who embarked on the hate trend against Johnny Depp. Everyone remembers her behaviour on a BBC interview where a reporter told her a gossip about Johnny learning his lines through an earpiece and instead of questioning the validity, she believed it and rolled her eyes in disgust about Johnny. Which I remember caused quite a hostile reaction from Johnny fans and many remember her for what she did and found her act snarky. Though it doesn't surprise me as she is notorious for doing that eye-rolling and putting her face into her hands whenever something annoys her. As for the earpiece in Johnny's ears, people who do their research know it was there to play music in his ear. To treat his tinnitus and to put him in the mood of certain scenes he was going to perform.

As of Daniel Radcliffe, who also said bad things about Johnny Depp in interviews, it would be nice to see him apologize for his remarks about Johnny Depp as what he said fuelled people's attacks against JD and toward J K Rowling who supported him because she knew all the facts about the case. I have seen Harry Potter fans/websites (Leaky Cauldron and Mugglenet) who have attacked both of them while exploiting from their work and image repeatedly. Which is really disgusting. Here are the links to the articles where he stated his remarks.

https://ew.com/movies/2018/01/12/daniel-radcliffe-johnny-depp-fantastic-beasts/

https://ca.movies.yahoo.com/daniel-radcliffe-reveals-hes-friends-with-racists-153311580.html

Thank you for this great interview.

For those who didn't get to sign the petition, here is the link to it.

https://www.change.org/p/dc-entertainment-remove-amber-heard-from-aquaman-2

And here is another link to another petition for Johnny. One asking Disney to bring him back for Pirates of the Caribbean.

https://www.change.org/p/walt-disney-we-want-johnny-depp-back-as-captain-jack-sparrow
